name: Maxwell's Meddling
description:
Maxwell's Meddling

You, the player are the demon, Maxwell, who
has risen to the realm of man to create chaos
and torture the pitiful inhabitants of this
world. Frighten the humans with your elemental
attacks, and cause them to damage their
surroundings and each other within the time alotted.
More points are awarded when the humans cause damage
than direct damage from elemental attacks. Enjoy
your time bringing Hell to Earth.

Controls:
A: Fire
X: Tornado
B: Ice Storm
P: Lightning
